name: yusuke-claude-code
description: Claude Code skills and plugins by Yusuke Miyashita

plugins.name: nanollm-train
plugins.description: End-to-end recipe for training LLMs from scratch or adapting them. Use this skill for designing, debugging, scaling, or aligning transformer LLMs. Prioritizes correctness, minimal abstractions, and avoiding expensive mistakes.

plugins.name: video-frame-reader
plugins.description: Extract keyframes from video files and analyze their content. Automatically removes duplicate frames and optimizes image quality to reduce token consumption.

plugins.name: codex
plugins.description: Use Codex CLI (OpenAI) for code review, design consultation, bug investigation, and difficult problem analysis. Provides real-time progress visibility compared to MCP-based integration.
